lead_paragraph: An airman at Grand Forks Air Force Base has been identified as the gunman in a shooting at a local Walmart that left one employee dead before he turned the gun on himself.

headline.print_headline: North Dakota: Walmart Gunman Identified as Airman
headline.main: North Dakota: Walmart Gunman Identified as Airman

snippet: An airman at Grand Forks Air Force Base has been identified as the gunman in a shooting at a local Walmart that left one employee dead before he turned the gun on himself.
abstract: North Dakota police say gunman involved in shooting at Walmart near Grand Forks Air Force Base was Airman Marcell Willis, who shot two employees and then killed himself.
